dc_description_s: Sport Fields locations as depicted by 2014 orthophotgraphy. The sport fields are represented polygons, whose lines are drawn on the edge of the field. The sport fields captured in this layer are football fields, basketball courts, baseball diamonds, soccer fields, golf course fairways and greens, tennis courts, other misc fields that may be used for more than one sport. This layer includes both public and private fields for Anne Arundel County, MD.QA/QC'd on 10/24/2014 by OITGIS. Many attribution errors were cleaned up. Also, deleted sport fields that were no longer exisitng based on the 2014 aerials. OIT GIS did not survey the 2014 aerials for new fields that were missing.
dc_title_s: Sports Fields: Anne Arundel County, Maryland
dc_creator_sm: Anne Arundel County, Office of Information Technology, Geographic Information Services (OIT GIS)
